message:
savarer kaoundia union er chairman saiful alam khan murad jong er dan hat.se akjon sontrasi kinto 3 barer nirbachito chairman.saiful chairmaner dan hat kaundia unioner sadar bari gramer akbarer vagina savar imandipur e basa o ranar vaira.rana akbar er basai lokiye ache bole dharona kora hocce.kaoundia unioner chairman saiful sob kicho jane.kaoundia union holo amin bazarer pase charidike nodi.

(ek fan er pathano)
